caption.title: DBS eluates and plasma vibriocidal responses in cholera patients and vaccinees.
caption.p: Vibriocidal responses in cholera patients (A) and vaccinees (B) at different time points (n = 17). The Bland-Altman analysis of vibriocidal response in DBS eluates and plasma of cholera patients at day 7 (C) and vaccinees at day 14 (D) is shown. Spearman correlation of vibriocidal response in DBS eluates and plasma at day 7 of cholera patients (E) and day 14 of vaccinees was carried out (F).
